translation.en: I am Bryan and you are Rufus.
translation.es: Yo soy Bryan y tú eres Rufus.

translation.en: Come on. Where did you go?
[man 1] Eve, you shouldn't have done it.
You have a group of parents petitioning to have you fired now.
translation.es: Hay un grupo de padrespidiendo que te despidan.

translation.en: I know who. They've been trying to get me fired since I started.
translation.es: Sé quiénes son. Han estado tratandoque me despidan desde que empecé.

translation.en: And it seems like you want them to succeed.
translation.es: Parece que quieres que lo logren.

translation.en: Maine state law requires sexual education.
translation.es: La ley del estado de Maineexige educación sexual.

translation.en: But local boards decide which topics.
translation.es: Pero la junta local decide los temas.

translation.en: And the topics they don't want covered, do we imagine they just disappear if we ignore them?
translation.es: ¿Y los temas que no quieren cubrir,solo desaparecen si los ignoramos?

translation.en: I may agree with you but when you teach topics that aren't covered by the board,
translation.es: Estoy de acuerdo contigo, pero cuandoenseñas temas no cubiertos por la junta,

translation.en: you're telling them about stuff that we've decided they're too young to know about.
translation.es: les hablas de cosas que decidimosque eran muy jóvenes para saber.

translation.en: These kids know how to Google.
And some people believe that such information will lead to them having sex.
translation.es: Y algunas personas creen que esainformación los llevará a que tengan sexo.

translation.en: But I know they will. There's a difference.
translation.es: Pero sé que lo harán.Esa es la diferencia.

translation.en: Nevertheless the board has decided to place you on administrative leave.
translation.es: La junta decidiódarte una licencia administrativa.

translation.en: There will be an official announcement tomorrow.
Even if I resign, the other schools will know why. I won't get a new job.
translation.es: Incluso si renuncio,las otras escuelas sabrán porqué. No conseguiré un nuevo trabajo.

translation.en: -I could go to work for the paper. -You already work too much.
translation.es: - Podría trabajar para el periódico.- Tú ya trabajas mucho.

translation.en: Or I could go back into advertising.
translation.es: O podría volver a la publicidad.

translation.en: And how long will it be before you start hating me for that?
translation.es: ¿Y en cuánto tiempo vas a empezara odiarme por eso?
No si lo ves de cerca.

translation.en: Mind giving our garden the same treatment, while we're away?
translation.es: ¿Podrían cuidar así de nuestrojardín mientras no estemos?

translation.en: If you take your bikes instead of the car.
translation.es: Si van en bicicleta en vez de en auto.

translation.en: You know, I saw at the library that it's the short trips that pollute the most.
translation.es: Sabes, vi en la bibliotecaque los viajes cortos contaminan más.
- Espero que no hayas ido en auto.- ¡Papá!

translation.en: any reason for your newfound interest in high-school football?
translation.es: ¿hay alguna razón para este nuevo interéspor el fútbol de secundaria?

translation.en: Is it a fascination with team psychology?
translation.es: ¿Es una fascinacióncon el equipo de psicología?

translation.en: Or are you making a study of the athlete as a modern gladiator?
translation.es: ¿O estás haciendo un estudiodel atleta como gladiador moderno?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because I, no, I had a feeling it might have something
translation.es: Sí, porque tuve la sensaciónque podría tener algo

translation.en: to do with the piercing blue eyes of Jay Heisel, super star quarterback.
translation.es: que ver con los ojos azulesde Jay Heisel, el mariscal de campo.

translation.en: there's more to life than good looks.
translation.es: hay más en la vida que ser guapo.

translation.en: -[Kevin] Adrian meeting us there? -[Alex] If they let him.
translation.es: ¿Allí nos encontramos con Adrian?Si lo dejan.

translation.en: I'm meeting Alex at the game.
translation.es: Me encontraré con Alex al partido.

translation.en: You know your father can't hear you when you're wearing makeup.
translation.es: Tu padre no te escucha cuandoestás maquillado.

translation.en: We're just culturally biased to like it. All football is is white-male aggression.
translation.es: Tendemos culturalmente a que nos guste. El fútbol es solo agresiónmasculina de blancos.

translation.en: Three-fourths of the NFL is black.
translation.es: Tres cuartos de la NFL son negros.

translation.en: Maybe they're oppressed and this is their way out of a bankrupt education system.
translation.es: Están oprimidos y esta es su salidade un sistema educativo quebrado.

translation.en: Maybe you can be oppressed and still like football.
translation.es: Quizás no sean dos cosas excluyentes.

translation.en: Either way I'm gonna enjoy my male privilege
Is that one of the moms that got you fired?
translation.es: ¿Es una de las mamás que te hizo despedir?

translation.en: -[groans] -[man 3] OK, Mia. Tell me where it is.
I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.es: No sé de qué estás hablando.

translation.en: Rob told me I could do whatever I want to you,
translation.es: Rob me dijo que podíahacerte lo que quisiera...

translation.en: as long as I make you talk, huh?
Well, maybe that's why Rob is dead now.
translation.es: Quizás por eso Rob está muerto.

translation.en: Well, why don't you call him?
Your boy's gonna get lucky tonight.
translation.es: Tu hijo tendrá suerte esta noche.

translation.en: It's not luck. He worked for it.
translation.es: No es suerte. Trabajó para ello.

translation.en: He sure can throw a ball.
translation.es: Él sí que sabe lanzar el balón.

translation.en: Yeah. Raised him to be a man.
translation.es: Sí. Lo crío para que sea un hombre.

translation.en: I don't think my brother knows what a man is.
translation.es: No sé si mi hermano sabelo que es un hombre.

translation.en: The team wanna celebrate at Kristofferson's.
translation.es: El equipo quiere celebraren lo de Kristofferson.

translation.en: Alex is not old enough for a party.
translation.es: Alex aún no tiene edadpara ir a una fiesta.

translation.en: Maybe we could have discussed it first.
you give her just another fake hook to make it painful when I say no.
translation.es: tú le das falsas expectativasque le duele más cuando le digo que no.

translation.en: -Maybe you shouldn't say no then. -I wish you would do it, but you don't.
translation.es: - Quizás no deberías decir no.- Ojalá tú lo hicieras, pero no lo haces.

translation.en: You say "maybe" and leave the dirty work to me.
translation.es: Me dejas el trabajo sucio a mí.

translation.en: She has to get out and experience life.
translation.es: Tiene que salir y experimentar la vida.

translation.en: It's time to let her go.
She just wants what's best for you.
translation.es: Solo quiere lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: Do you also think this is what's best for me?
translation.es: ¿Tú también creesque esto es lo mejor para mí?

translation.en: -She loves you. -She has no idea what love is--
translation.es: - Ella te ama.- No tiene idea de qué es el amor.

translation.en: I remember when I first fell in love with her.
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando me enamoré de ella.

translation.en: Every second I couldn't be with her killed me.
translation.es: Cada segundo que no estabacon ella me mataba.

translation.en: She doesn't understand our kind of love.
translation.es: Ella no entiende nuestro tipo de amor.

translation.en: Doesn't mean she loves any less.
translation.es: No significa que nos ame menos.
Espera a que tu mamá se duerma.

translation.en: If you can get Adrian to go with you...
you can go for a couple of hours.
translation.es: puedes ir por un par de horas.

translation.en: -Pretty nice of your dad to let you go. -Very nice of you to join me.
translation.es: Muy amable de tu papá dejarte venir. Muy amable de tu parte acompañarme.
¿Y a tu papá le pareció bien?

translation.en: What's the point of asking permission if he won't talk to you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué le pides permisosi ni siquiera te habla?

translation.en: Not that I miss him calling me a freak.
translation.es: Pero no extraño oírlo llamarme fenómeno.

translation.en: I think you should just move in with us. I mean, we could adopt you.
translation.es: Creo que deberías mudarte con nosotros.Quiero decir, podríamos adoptarte.

translation.en: Oh, like a little shelter puppy.
Yeah, then we could watch cheesy '80s movies every night.
translation.es: Sí, y podemos ver películasde los ochenta todas las noches.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure Kevin and Eve would love that.
translation.es: Sí, seguro que a Keviny a Eve les encantaría.

translation.en: Yeah, of course they would. Mom's at least 30% less annoying when you're around.
translation.es: Sí, claro que sí. Mamá siemprees un 30% menos molesta cuando tú estás.

translation.en: They would love it. I'd love it.
translation.es: Les encantaría. Igual que a mí.

translation.en: And you are aware that pretty much all of these people are superficial assholes.
translation.es: Y estás al tanto de que casi todos ellosson unos cretinos superficiales.

translation.en: I promise I will follow you wherever you wanna go when you fall in love with a guy, OK?
translation.es: Te prometo que te seguiré adonde vayascuando te enamores de un chico, ¿sí?

translation.en: Or a girl. I don't fall for gender. I fall for--
translation.es: O una chica.Yo no me enamoro de géneros, solo de...

translation.en: That's, like, totally offensive to the local culture.
translation.es: Eso es muy ofensivo para la cultura local.

translation.en: I'm here to hook up with hot football jocks.
translation.es: Vine a acostarme con los deportistas.

translation.en: Oh? I thought you were a bottom.
-We're just having fun. -Doesn't look like he's having fun.
translation.es: Solo nos estamos divirtiendo. No parece.

translation.en: I'm sorry for my friends. Apparently, they forgot what century we live in.
translation.es: Perdón por mis amigos.Olvidaron en qué siglo vivimos.

translation.en: I'm sorry about this. I'm gonna get you guys a drink.
translation.es: Perdón por esto. Les traeré un trago.

translation.en: Well, if nothing else, then just to shake off this whole experience, OK?
translation.es: Bueno, aunque sea para olvidaresta experiencia. ¿Sí?

translation.en: God. You're such a pussy. You know that, right?
translation.es: Dios. Eres un cobarde. Lo sabes, ¿no?

translation.en: -Do you want me to arrest him for you? -Fuck you.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres que la arreste por ti?- Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: [exhales] Something killed my dog. I-I-It killed my fucking dog.
translation.es: Algo mató a mi perro.Mató a mi maldito perro.

translation.en: A-A-And there was a... Something in the mist.
translation.es: Y había... algo en la niebla.

translation.en: Don't tell me to calm down, OK?
There was something in the mist. Do you not understand that? Something in it.
translation.es: Había algo en la niebla.¿No entienden? ¡Había algo adentro!

translation.en: Now, can you tell us, have you done any drugs lately?
Done any drugs, man? What the fuck?
-I'm telling you something-- -Somthing killed your dog.
translation.es: - Les estoy diciendo que algo...- Mató a tu perro.

translation.en: Listen, you can't spread fear like that. It disrupts the public order.
translation.es: No puedes ir esparciendo miedo.Perturba el orden público.

translation.en: Maybe you might wanna stay here until you sober up again.
translation.es: Quizás deberías quedarte aquíhasta que estés sobrio.

translation.en: -Get off me! -[Pundik] Stay down. I'm telling you!
What are you doing here? Who are you?
The old lady? She died two months ago.
I left some things in the shed--
translation.es: Dejé unas cosas en el cobertizo.

translation.en: Her stuff is in the storage locker downtown. They couldn't find her daughter.
translation.es: Sus cosas están en un depósitoen el centro. No encontraban a su hija.

translation.en: Who did you say you were?
Yeah, well, there was nothing of value in the garden shed.
translation.es: Bueno, no había nada de valoren el cobertizo.

translation.en: You want that, you'll have to take it up with the estate lawyer.
translation.es: Si los quieres, deberás hablarlocon el abogado estatal.

translation.en: -Where is she? -I-I don't know. Maybe she's, uh...
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está?- No lo sé, quizás esté...

translation.en: [Eve] Sweetie, you have to tell us what happened.
We can't help you unless you tell us.
translation.es: No podemos ayudarte si no nos cuentas.

translation.en: The last thing I remember is someone helping me upstairs.
translation.es: Lo último que recuerdo es alguienque me ayudaba a subir.

translation.en: [Kevin] Alex, I told you not to drink.
translation.es: Alex, te dije que no bebieras.

translation.en: [Kevin] I told her she could go.
-[Eve] What are you talking about? -[Kevin] I said she could go with Adrian.
translation.es: - ¿De qué estás hablando?- Le dije que podía ir si iba con Adrian.

translation.en: -[Eve] Who allowed you to do that? -[Kevin] I allowed it.
translation.es: - ¿Y quién te permitió hacer eso?- Yo se lo permití.

translation.en: [Eve] It's OK, sweetie. You're home now. That's what matters.
translation.es: Está bien. Estás en casa ahora.Eso es lo que importa.

translation.en: I could feel what had happened.
There was blood on the sheets.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have gone.
translation.es: Lo siento. No debí haber ido.

translation.en: [sniffles] This can never be your fault.
translation.es: Esto nunca puede ser tu culpa.

translation.en: We have to take her to the police.

translation.es: - Eve, lo...- Lo hiciste a mis espaldas.

translation.en: Yes, because you... You're keeping her locked up.
translation.es: Sí, porque tú…Tú la tienes encerrada.

translation.en: We have to be there for her.
Well, it looks like you have calmed down a bit.
translation.es: Parece que te has calmado un poco.

translation.en: Why don't you tell me who you are? I'll file the report. We can all go home.
translation.es: Dime quién eres.Haré un informe y podremos irnos.

translation.en: Look, please, just listen to me.
Hey, hey! No! You can't do that!
Oh, yeah? You can remember the law, huh?
Well, it looks like we are calling Arrowhead,
translation.es: Bueno, nosotros llamaremosa Punta de Flecha,

translation.en: and you are staying a while longer.
translation.es: Bueno, nosotros llamaremosa Punta de Flecha, y tú te quedarás un poco más.
- Dame las huellas de este lunático.- Por favor.

translation.en: What can I do for you?
Maybe it's best we speak to someone else.
translation.es: Será mejor si podemos hablarcon alguien más.

translation.en: We need you to come with us.
-Why? What's going on? -Just please come with us.
Is it something with my dad?
We just need you to come down to the station and answer a few questions.
translation.es: Necesitamos que vengas a la comisaríaa responder unas preguntas.

translation.en: You're being investigated for sexual assault.
The police had a few more questions for her and then you can go home.
translation.es: La policía tiene unas preguntas más.Luego se pueden ir.

translation.en: She should see a therapist as soon as possible.
translation.es: Debería ver a un terapeutalo antes posible.

translation.en: From you she needs stability, safety.
-Kevin, I can't say anything-- -I need to know.
translation.es: - Kevin, no puedo decir nada...- Necesito saber.

translation.en: [sighs] There are signs of intercourse, but no violence.
translation.es: Hay señales de relaciones,pero sin violencia.

translation.en: There are also traces of Triazolam in her blood.
translation.es: También hay rastros de sedantesen su sangre.

translation.en: -What about the DNA? Can't you-- -We took one.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay del ADN? ¿Pudiste...?- Tomamos una muestra.

translation.en: And that will show who, but not that it was rape.
translation.es: Eso dirá quién fue,pero no que fue violación.

translation.en: I don't know what to do.
You already went to the police.
-You don't have to do anything-- -No, I don't know what to do.
translation.es: - No tienes nada que hacer.- No, no sé qué hacer.

translation.en: I can't watch TV. I can't read.
translation.es: No puedo ver televisión. No puedo leer.

translation.en: I wanted to listen to some music and I had to pick a song,
translation.es: Quería escuchar músicay debía escoger una canción,

translation.en: and I was, like, the song I pick,
it will always be the first song I heard after...
translation.es: será siempre la que escuché después...

translation.en: Hm, we can choose a really bad song.
Like a stupid Katy Perry song, or something.
translation.es: Como una estúpida canciónde Katy Perry, o algo parecido.

translation.en: That way you won't ruin a good song.
translation.es: Así no arruinarás una buena canción.

translation.en: I like Katy Perry. You hate her.
translation.es: Me gusta Katy Perry. Tú la odias.

translation.en: You can't let them win, you know?
You know how this is gonna go.
They will say you're a liar.
I shouldn't have gone behind your back.
translation.es: No debí hablarle a tus espaldas.

translation.en: Do you have any idea what it's like having been bad cop for 16 years?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea de lo que es ser la malade la película por 16 años?

translation.en: 16 years of a daughter who loves you and who hates...?
translation.es: ¿16 años de una hijaque te ama y que me odia...?

translation.en: [Connor] If they haven't pressed charges, the case is weak.
translation.es: Si no presentaron cargos,el caso es débil.

translation.en: And Ron... Ron's a good lawyer.
translation.es: Y Ron... Ron es buen abogado.

translation.en: You just... You do what he says.
translation.es: Solo haz lo que te diga.

translation.en: Follow his lead and be honest with him.
translation.es: Hazle caso y sé honesto con él.

translation.en: You can tell him anything, but you can't repeat it, right?
translation.es: Puedes decirle todo,pero no puede repetirlo, ¿verdad?.

translation.en: Why do you talk to me as if I did it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me hablas como si fuera culpable?

translation.en: I thought I told you to get out of here.
translation.es: Creí haberte dicho que te fueras.
- Solo déjame...- Esto es propiedad privada,

translation.en: You got no business being here.
translation.es: Tú no tienes nada que hacer aquí.

translation.en: Hey, I'm not here to hurt you.
Are you afraid of the cops?
You should have thought of that before you tried to steal whatever this is.
translation.es: Quizás debiste pensarlo antes de intentarrobar lo que sea que es esto.

translation.en: There was something in the mist. I-I-It's on its way.
translation.es: Había algo en la niebla.Está en camino.

translation.en: Alex is not safe here. We're staying at my sister's.
translation.es: Alex no está segura aquí.Iremos a lo de mi hermana.

translation.en: I'll find a therapist in St. Vincent.
translation.es: Encontraré un terapeuta en St. Vincent.

translation.en: And Dr. Sing phoned in a prescription for Valium. I'll pick it up.
translation.es: El Dr. Sing le hizo una receta de Valium,lo compraré.

translation.en: It was a party. There's no way I could have known.
translation.es: Fue una fiesta.De ningún modo podría haberlo sabido.

translation.en: But I could, which is why I said no.
translation.es: Pero yo sí podía, por eso dije que no.

translation.en: Because I've spent my entire life around guys like Jay.
translation.es: Porque pasé toda mi vidacon chicos como Jay.

translation.en: I can't be with you right now, OK?
Come up in a few days. Then we'll talk.
translation.es: Ven en unos días y hablaremos.

translation.en: You should get the window fixed,
and then go to the police with the harassment.
translation.es: y denunciar el acoso a la policía.

translation.en: [Benedict] I thought we'd agreed you'd stop looking for conspiracy theories on the internet.
translation.es: Creí que acordamos que no buscaríamosteorías conspirativas por Internet.

translation.en: You know Dr. Kleerick says it's not good for you.
translation.es: El Dr. Kleerick diceque no es bueno para ti.

translation.en: This is not the internet, it's the Bridgeville Post. I'm fine.
translation.es: Esto no es la internet,es El Bridgeville Post. Estoy bien.

translation.en: Now go back to your comics.
"Six people were found dead. Presumably killed by a bear."
translation.es: "Seis personas fueron halladas muertas.Presumiblemente asesinadas por un oso."

translation.en: "Other animals came down the mountain in large numbers,
translation.es: "Otros animales bajaron de la montañaen grandes números,

translation.en: including moose and deer and foxes."
[Nathalie] "Some locals fear it's a Black Spring...
translation.es: "Algunos temen que sea la Primavera Negra,

translation.en: a legend of nature turning sour,
translation.es: una leyenda de la naturalezacon un giro amargo,

translation.en: as evidenced by the frozen lake being black like a rotten tooth."
translation.es: como se ve en el lago congelado,negro como un diente podrido".

translation.en: The Bridgeville Post sure ain't what it used to be.
translation.es: El Bridgeville Postno es lo que solía ser.

translation.en: -[sighs] What do you want? -Maybe I should speak to Officer Pundik.
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres?- Quizás debería hablar con Pundik.

translation.en: Pundik is picking up Adrian for questioning.
translation.es: Pundik está buscando a Adrianpara interrogarlo.
- ¿Por qué?- Porque él es un testigo.

translation.en: Are you OK to talk to me? Or you can wait until Pundik's done.
translation.es: Puedes hablarme a mí o esperaruna hora o dos a que Pundik termine.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I know this isn't what you want.
translation.es: Sé que esto no es lo que quieres.

translation.en: But it's for the best. The way things are right now.
translation.es: Pero es lo mejor por cómo estánlas cosas ahora.

translation.en: Everything I do, I do to protect you.
translation.es: Todo lo que hago es para protegerte.

translation.en: You're not protecting me, you're controlling me.
Please! You just don't want me to do what you did.
translation.es: ¡Por favor! Tú solo no quieresque haga lo que hiciste tú.

translation.en: But guess what? I won't 'cause I'm nothing like you.
translation.es: ¿Pero sabes qué? No soy como tú.

translation.en: You're embarrassing yourself at school, and...
translation.es: Te estás humillando en la escuela y...

translation.en: What do you mean do what I did?
translation.es: ¿A qué te refieres con lo que hice yo?

translation.en: -What do you mean? -You said it yourself. It's a small town.
translation.es: - ¿A qué te refieres?- Tú lo dijiste, es un pueblo pequeño.

translation.en: I'm gonna go pick up the Valium.
Do you wanna come, or do you wanna wait here?
-[Connor] It's amazing. -[Kevin] It's moving against the wind.
translation.es: Es asombroso. Se mueve contra el viento.

translation.en: Dad, will you please come with us? I don't wanna go with Mom.
translation.es: Papá, ¿puedes venir con nosotras?No quiero ir con mamá.

translation.en: I'll be there soon, honey. You'll be fine. Where's Mom?
translation.es: Iré pronto, cariño.Estarás bien. ¿Dónde está mamá?

translation.en: We're at the mall. Dad, please. I don't wanna leave.
translation.es: Estamos en el centro comercial.Por favor, no quiero ir.

translation.en: It will blow over in a minute.
No, just... just wait. Just wait.
I wanna get, uh, a photo for the missus.
translation.es: Quiero tomar una foto para mi esposa.

translation.en: Great. You do that, Pundik. We'll see you inside.
OK, get in the car. We gotta go.
-What is it? What's going on? -Come on! Let's go!
Shall we wait till it's gone?
[Nathalie] It's like that time at the inn up by Chocolate Lake.
translation.es: Es como la vez en la hosteríadel lago Chocolate.
Excepto que nos quedamos en la cama.

translation.en: Oh... no. Wrong, wrong... wrong direction.
These trees were by the church, so that means the bikes must be that way.
translation.es: Estos árboles son de la iglesia,las bicicletas deben estar allá.

translation.en: -Are you real? -We are. We are. We are real.
-But it's all real. -Put down the gun.
translation.es: - Todo es real.- Baja el arma.

translation.en: -What's going on? -It's OK. We just have to--
translation.es: - ¿Qué está sucediendo?- Está bien. Solo tenemos que...

translation.en: Hey, get us the fuck out of here, man. You gotta get us out.
translation.es: Sácanos de aquí, amigo.Debes sacarnos de aquí.

translation.en: There's something in the mist. It killed my dog. You can't let us stay.
translation.es: Hay algo en la niebla.Mató a mi perro. No puedes dejarnos aquí.

translation.en: And what are you gonna do?

translation.es: Buscar a mi esposa y a mi hija.

translation.en: [scoffs] No. What are you gonna do with us?
translation.es: Buscar a mi esposa y a mi hija. No, ¿qué vas a hacer con nosotros?

translation.en: Whatever's happened will be over soon.
translation.es: Lo que haya pasado seguroterminará pronto.

translation.en: Please. The sheriff thought I was crazy, but I warned them about the mist.
translation.es: El comisario creyó que estaba loco,pero yo les advertí de la niebla.

translation.en: Don't let her out. She looks unstable. Like she did something bad.
translation.es: No la sueltes. Luce inestable. Ella hizo algo malo.

translation.en: And you're never gonna be able to live with yourself, if you leave us behind,
translation.es: Y nunca podrás vivir con ti mismo,si nos abandonas,

translation.en: 'cause if you do, we die and you know it.
translation.es: porque si lo haces, morimos, y lo sabes.

translation.en: Besides, if there's something out there,
translation.es: Además, si hay algo allí afuera,

translation.en: how are you gonna survive taking care of a... scared little freak
translation.es: ¿cómo vas a sobrevivir cuidandoa un pequeño y asustado fenómeno

translation.en: And if you don't apologize, I'm gonna tell Kevin you threatened me.
translation.es: Y si no te disculpas,le diré a Kevin que me amenazaste.

translation.en: See you get out of here then.
But I don't take orders from anyone.
translation.es: Pero no recibo órdenes de nadie.

translation.en: And whatever's out there, you're probably better off
translation.es: Y sea lo que sea que hay afuera,debes estar mejor

translation.en: with a verbally abusive bitch protecting you.
-Mrs Carmody. -You should be ashamed of yourself.
Why? Because I showed them a condom?
Or because I mentioned oral sex?
Because you can raise your child any way you want to, and clearly you have,
translation.es: Porque tú puedes criar a tu hijacomo quieras, y claramente lo hiciste,

translation.en: but leave my child out of it.
translation.es: pero deja a mi hijo fuera de esto.

translation.en: Oh, I'm pretty sure Eric here knows what a blowjob is,
translation.es: Estoy muy segura de que Ericsabe lo que es una mamada,

translation.en: seeing how I caught him watching porn on his phone the other day.
translation.es: ya que lo vi viendo pornoen el teléfono el otro día.

translation.en: [woman 1] Have you ever seen this before?
Mom, we need to get inside.
No! Stop! There's something out there!
I'm so fed up with you people and your need for attention.
translation.es: Ya me tienen harta tratandode llamar la atención.

translation.en: Said the girl who lied about getting raped.
translation.es: Lo dice la chica que mintiósobre una violación.

translation.en: Do you even know where to point that thing?
That's the way it's gonna be.
Alright. This way. Connor will be waiting outside.
translation.es: Bueno, por aquí.Connor nos está esperando afuera.

translation.en: OK. I just wanna go home.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Solo quiero ir a casa.

translation.en: I know, but we're gonna have to wait till we find out what's going on.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero tendremos que esperarhasta saber lo que está pasando.
